languages.text: "Пустые оправдания. Снова". {n}Дуло болтера смотрит вам прямо между глаз.{/n}
"Hollow excuses. Again." {n}The muzzle of Yeager's bolter stares you between the eyes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Пустые оправдания. Снова". {n}Дуло болтера смотрит вам прямо между глаз.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hollow excuses. Again." {n}The muzzle of the bolter stares you between the eyes once more.{/n}

languages.text: «Excusas inútiles. Otra vez». {n}El cañón del bólter de Yeager te mira a los ojos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hollow excuses. Again." {n}The muzzle of Yeager's bolter stares you between the eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Excusas inútiles. Otra vez». {n}El cañón del bólter de Yeager te mira a los ojos.{/n}

languages.text: “又来了，何等苍白的借口。”{n}耶格尔手中的爆矢枪直直地指着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hollow excuses. Again." {n}The muzzle of Yeager's bolter stares you between the eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “又来了，何等苍白的借口。”{n}耶格尔手中的爆矢枪直直地指着你。{/n}

languages.text: 「また、中身のない言い訳ですね」{n}イェーガーのボルターの銃口があなたの眉間に向けられる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hollow excuses. Again." {n}The muzzle of Yeager's bolter stares you between the eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「また、中身のない言い訳ですね」{n}イェーガーのボルターの銃口があなたの眉間に向けられる。{/n}

languages.text: « De vaines excuses, une fois de plus. » {n}Le canon du bolter de Yeager est braqué sur votre front, pile entre les deux yeux.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hollow excuses. Again." {n}The muzzle of Yeager's bolter stares you between the eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « De vaines excuses, une fois de plus. » {n}Le canon du bolter de Yeager est braqué sur votre front, pile entre les deux yeux.{/n}

languages.text: "Boş bir bahane. Yine." {n}Yeager'ın bulonatarının namlusu, alnının çatına dikiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hollow excuses. Again." {n}The muzzle of Yeager's bolter stares you between the eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Boş bir bahane. Yine." {n}Yeager'ın bulonatarının namlusu, alnının çatına dikiliyor.{/n}

languages.text: "Alles nur Ausflüchte. Wie immer." {n}Die Mündung von Yeagers Bolter ist zwischen deine Augen gerichtet.{/n}
